content: your foot add a stitch marker and join the work in the round note as i use 9 circulars i tend to work the first row straight and then join in the round as i find it easier to join 2 x 1 rib cuff rounds 1-8 k2 p1 to end/bor marker for small sock round 9 k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 56sts for medium sock round 9 k3 k2tog k to last 3 sts k2tog k1 64sts for large sock round 9 k to bor 72sts break cuff yarn leg using mc knit 4 rounds do not break mc yarn note if you wish to knit a longer leg then simply continue knitting until the leg measures your preferred length heel flap the heel flap is worked straight i use the 2 25mm dpns but you could also use the longer circular needles setup round without changing needles or yarn k the first 32 sts then using one dpn and your heel yarn k2 s1wyib k1 to end turn your work leaving the top of the foot stitches on hold and continue to work back and forth with 2 dpns round 1 ws sl1 p to end round 2 rs sl1 k1 to end repeat rounds 1 and 2 a total of 14 16 18 times which is 28 32 36 row in total heel turn using the heel yarn round 1 rs sl1 k 14 16 18 ssk k1 turn round 2 ws sl1 p3 p2tog p1 turn round 3 rs sl1 k to 1 st before the gap ssk k1 turn round 4 ws sl p to 1 st before the gap p2tog p1 turn repeat rounds 3 and 4 ending with round 3 until all sts have been worked you will have 16 18 20 sts remaining on the heel flap break the heel yarn 3 gusset you will now work the gusset decreases using the mc yarn set-up round 1 pm in mc pick up and knit 15 17 19 sts along the right edge of the heel knit across the heel turn stitches pick up and knit 15 17 19 sts along the left edge of the heel flap and place new bor marker round 1 k across instep stitches sm k1 ssk knit k to 3 sts before the bor k2tog k1 round 2 k to bor slipping markers as you reach them repeat round 1 and 2 until 28 32 36 sts remain for the sole of the sock this will be 56 64 72 sts in total note you can now remove the second marker keeping the bor marker foot round 1 k to bor you will now complete the foot of the sock by repeating round 1 until it measures 2 5cm shorter than the required length of your foot break mc yarn toe for the toe i change to longer circular 2 25mm needles and continue in magic loop but you can use your preferred method change
